solution_line_template: He had B - {history_books} books after the history section.
He had B - {history_books} - {fiction_books} = B - {history_books_plus_fiction} books after the fiction section.
He had B - {history_books_plus_fiction} - {children_books} + {misplaced_books} = B - {total_books_removed} books after the children’s section.
He still had B - {total_books_removed} = {books_remaining} books to shelve.
Thus, he started with B = {books_remaining} + {total_books_removed} = <<{books_remaining}+{total_books_removed}={books_started}>>{books_started} books in the cart.
